content.question: From Quis enim bene celat amorem? (line 9), we can infer that

choices.label: Jason pledged his love to Medea
Medea could not hide her love
Medea does not know whom to love
Jason questions the value of love

content.answer: Medea could not hide her love

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
